trans-unit.target: 在 Visual Basic 中的 LINQ 入门 |Microsoft 文档

trans-unit.source: Getting Started with LINQ in Visual Basic
trans-unit.target: Visual Basic 中的 LINQ 入门

trans-unit.source: This section contains overviews, examples, and background information that will help you understand and use Visual Basic and Language-Integrated Query (LINQ).
trans-unit.target: 本部分包含概述、 示例和帮助您了解和使用 Visual Basic 和语言集成查询 (LINQ) 的背景信息。

trans-unit.source: In This Section
trans-unit.target: 本节内容

trans-unit.source: [Writing Your First LINQ Query](../../../../visual-basic/programming-guide/concepts/linq/writing-your-first-linq-query.md)
trans-unit.target: [编写第一个 LINQ 查询](../../../../visual-basic/programming-guide/concepts/linq/writing-your-first-linq-query.md)

trans-unit.source: Describes the three stages in writing a basic LINQ query: obtaining the data source, writing the query, and executing the query.
trans-unit.target: 介绍编写基本的 LINQ 查询中的三个阶段︰ 获取数据源、 编写查询，并执行查询。

trans-unit.source: [Basic Query Operations (Visual Basic)](../../../../visual-basic/programming-guide/concepts/linq/basic-query-operations.md)
trans-unit.target: [基本查询操作 (Visual Basic)](../../../../visual-basic/programming-guide/concepts/linq/basic-query-operations.md)

trans-unit.source: Describes the most common types of query operations and how they are expressed in Visual Basic.
trans-unit.target: 描述最常见类型的查询操作和它们在 Visual Basic 中的表达方式。

trans-unit.source: [Visual Basic Features That Support LINQ](../../../../visual-basic/programming-guide/concepts/linq/features-that-support-linq.md)
trans-unit.target: [支持 LINQ 的 Visual Basic 功能](../../../../visual-basic/programming-guide/concepts/linq/features-that-support-linq.md)

trans-unit.source: Describes the Visual Basic language features that support LINQ, such as anonymous types and type inference.
trans-unit.target: 介绍 Visual Basic 语言功能，支持 LINQ，如匿名类型和类型推理。

trans-unit.source: [Type Relationships in Query Operations (Visual Basic)](../../../../visual-basic/programming-guide/concepts/linq/type-relationships-in-query-operations.md)
trans-unit.target: [查询操作 (Visual Basic 中) 中的类型关系](../../../../visual-basic/programming-guide/concepts/linq/type-relationships-in-query-operations.md)

trans-unit.source: Describes how data types are preserved or transformed when queries are written and executed.
trans-unit.target: 描述如何保留和转换时编写和执行查询的数据类型。

trans-unit.source: [Walkthrough: Writing Queries in Visual Basic](../../../../visual-basic/programming-guide/concepts/linq/walkthrough-writing-queries.md)
trans-unit.target: [演练︰ 在 Visual Basic 中编写查询](../../../../visual-basic/programming-guide/concepts/linq/walkthrough-writing-queries.md)

trans-unit.source: Step-by-step instructions for creating a Visual Basic LINQ project, adding a simple data source, and performing some basic query operations.
trans-unit.target: 创建 Visual Basic LINQ 项目、 添加一个简单的数据源，并执行一些基本查询操作的分步说明。

trans-unit.source: Related Sections
trans-unit.target: 相关章节

trans-unit.source: [Introduction to LINQ in Visual Basic](../../../../visual-basic/programming-guide/language-features/linq/introduction-to-linq.md)
trans-unit.target: [在 Visual Basic 中的 LINQ 简介](../../../../visual-basic/programming-guide/language-features/linq/introduction-to-linq.md)

trans-unit.source: Includes an overview of queries in LINQ and provides links to additional resources.
trans-unit.target: 在 LINQ 中包括的查询的概述，并提供到其他资源的链接。

trans-unit.source: [Overview of LINQ to XML in Visual Basic](../../../../visual-basic/programming-guide/language-features/xml/overview-of-linq-to-xml.md)
trans-unit.target: [LINQ to XML 在 Visual Basic 中的概述](../../../../visual-basic/programming-guide/language-features/xml/overview-of-linq-to-xml.md)

trans-unit.source: Describes how Visual Basic supports LINQ to XML.
trans-unit.target: 描述如何 Visual Basic 支持 LINQ to XML。

trans-unit.source: [LINQ to DataSet Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/dc20a8fb-03f6-4b68-9c2b-7f7299e3070b)
trans-unit.target: [LINQ to DataSet 概述](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/dc20a8fb-03f6-4b68-9c2b-7f7299e3070b)

trans-unit.source: Provides a conceptual overview of LINQ to DataSet.
trans-unit.target: 向数据集提供 LINQ 的概念性概述。

trans-unit.source: [LINQ to SQL](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/bb386976)
trans-unit.target: [LINQ to SQL](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/bb386976)

trans-unit.source: Explains the LINQ to SQL technology and provides links to topics that help you use LINQ to SQL.
trans-unit.target: 解释 LINQ to SQL 技术，并提供指向主题的帮助您使用 LINQ to SQL。

trans-unit.source: [Visual Studio IDE and Tools Support for LINQ (Visual Basic)](../../../../visual-basic/programming-guide/concepts/linq/visual-studio-ide-and-tools-support-for-linq.md)
trans-unit.target: [Visual Studio IDE 和工具支持 linq (Visual Basic)](../../../../visual-basic/programming-guide/concepts/linq/visual-studio-ide-and-tools-support-for-linq.md)

trans-unit.source: Describes tools that are available in the Visual Studio environment for designing, coding, and debugging LINQ-enabled applications.
trans-unit.target: 描述设计、 编码和调试启用 LINQ 的应用程序的 Visual Studio 环境中可用的工具。

trans-unit.source: [LINQ to Objects (Visual Basic)](../../../../visual-basic/programming-guide/concepts/linq/linq-to-objects.md)
trans-unit.target: [LINQ to Objects (Visual Basic)](../../../../visual-basic/programming-guide/concepts/linq/linq-to-objects.md)

trans-unit.source: Includes a selection of How-to topics for using LINQ with in-memory collections.
trans-unit.target: 包含一系列的帮助主题中有关 LINQ 与内存中集合一起使用。

trans-unit.source: [LINQ to XML (Visual Basic)](../../../../visual-basic/programming-guide/concepts/linq/linq-to-xml.md)
trans-unit.target: [LINQ to XML (Visual Basic)](../../../../visual-basic/programming-guide/concepts/linq/linq-to-xml.md)

trans-unit.source: Includes links to topics that explain how to use LINQ to XML, which provides the in-memory document modification capabilities of the Document Object Model (DOM), and supports LINQ query expressions.
trans-unit.target: 包含指向这些主题介绍如何使用 LINQ to XML，这提供内存中文档修改功能的文档对象模型 (DOM) 中，并支持 LINQ 查询表达式。

trans-unit.source: [Language-Integrated Query (LINQ) (Visual Basic)](../../../../visual-basic/programming-guide/concepts/linq/index.md)
trans-unit.target: [语言集成查询 (LINQ) (Visual Basic)](../../../../visual-basic/programming-guide/concepts/linq/index.md)

trans-unit.source: Provides links to topics that explain the LINQ technologies.
trans-unit.target: 提供一些链接，这些主题介绍了 LINQ 技术。

trans-unit.source: [Getting Started with LINQ in C#](../../../../csharp/programming-guide/concepts/linq/getting-started-with-linq.md)
trans-unit.target: [C# 中的 LINQ 入门](../../../../csharp/programming-guide/concepts/linq/getting-started-with-linq.md)

trans-unit.source: Provides links to topics about using LINQ in C#.
trans-unit.target: 提供指向有关如何使用 C# 中的 LINQ 主题的链接。
